description.en: Redis is an open source, in-memory data structure store used as a database, cache, message broker, and queue.
description.zh: Redis是一个开源的内存数据结构存储，用作数据库、缓存、消息代理和队列。

description.en: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open source object-relational database system.
description.zh: PostgreSQL是一个功能强大的开源对象关系数据库系统。

description.en: Meilisearch is a lightning-fast search engine that fits effortlessly into your apps, websites, and workflows.
description.zh: Meilisearch是一个闪电般快速的搜索引擎，可以轻松地集成到您的应用程序、网站和工作流程中。

description.en: Docker is a platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers.
description.zh: Docker是一个用于在容器中开发、传输和运行应用程序的平台。

description.en: Proxmox is an open-source virtualization management platform for enterprise virtualization.
description.zh: Proxmox是一个开源的企业虚拟化管理平台。

description.en: Caddy is a powerful, enterprise-ready, open source web server with automatic HTTPS.
description.zh: Caddy是一个功能强大、企业级就绪的开源Web服务器，具有自动HTTPS功能。

description.en: GraphQL is a query language for APIs and a runtime for fulfilling those queries with your existing data.
description.zh: GraphQL是一种用于API的查询语言，以及一个用现有数据完成这些查询的运行时。
